name: excavator
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
UK (US steam shovel) a large, powerful machine with a container connected to a long arm, used for digging up the ground
DarthArt/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
a person who digs up the ground looking for something: Teams of excavators have been searching for human remains.
